title: Inner Balance Wellness IMR0008-08NA Neck and Shoulder Massager, Gray
description: SM100 - Neck and Shoulder Massager - This neck and shoulder massager will help melt the tension from the muscles in and around your neck and shoulder area with it's 8 massage intensities and 5 massage modes. This unit is capable of a gentle massage on up to and aggressive penetrating deep tissue massage and is extremely easy to use with it's built in controller.
